name: Fighting Game (Sort Of)
description:
Master the fundamentals of most fighting games. Shield beats attack, attack beats grab, and grab beats shield. Hone your reflexes to react whatever the opponent throws at you. 

--------------------

Dev story

I was thinking of making a full-pledge fighting game but ended up making something that simplifies the concept of it.  I'm planning to make small games out of the concepts in fighting games and then release a great fighting game once I'm done.
